EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App - 2015.06.09.Ema
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App webinar.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App! In the webinar, guest Forrester Research Analyst Michael Facemire and Tricentis Founder and Chief Product Officer, Wolfgang Platz, discussed how to ensure the quality of modern mobile apps and contain the end-to-end explosion of back-end data sources that ultimately deliver the ideal mobile app experience.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-managing-the-chaos>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Michael Facemire Principal Analyst Forrester
Wolfgang Platz Founder and Chief Product Officer​ Tricentis
